result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alma E Guerra

records.addlTxt:
2:31 PM Defendant Alma E Guerra in court.  Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has applied for SPD, but no one is appointed yet.  Defendant advised to go to SPD to confirm appointment.  Defendant was also given information regarding court appointed attorney. Case rescheduled.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 02:20 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Alma E Guerra
Current: 2013 Greenway Cross Apt 6, Fitchburg, WI 53713 United States  (Effective: 08-22-2022)
Prior: 5409 Woodley Ln, Madison, WI 53713
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 02:20 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with JM-A. 
- Defendant shall not be in the 2400 block of Post Rd in Fitchburg. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 2

ADDRESS INFO for Alma E Guerra
Current: 5409 Woodley Ln, Madison, WI 53713   (Effective: 07-08-2022)
Prior: 2401 Post Rd Apt 112, Fitchburg, WI 53713

03:12 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides.  Benjamin Wagner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
